titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie hearyng by reporte of some of the subiectes of her good brother the kyng of Spayne, that notwithstandyng both the seueritie of iustice diuers tymes extended by her maiestie agaynst sundry pirates ...
Proclamations. 1561-07-08
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churhcyarde, by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maistie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
